name: IGMH- I've Got My Home
description:
Home is where life gets colored ,where the outside world seems grey and dark ,and the only place the one gets real comfort is home.
home is where the mother is ,where the bother and sister and joy is, all dreams begin , i wanted to simulate the children at wars ,who would lose their home's for the outsiders greed,i wanted to make a game where the primary objective is to protect your home,your last colored place ,your last path to happiness,from people who only see's destruction and darkness.
i hope i made the idea clear ,since its a two days game and not all the thoughts where out on this build.

sorry about the camera.
hope you like it ^^.
